segments.text: The kitchen looks bright with daylight from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman in an apron stands at the sink, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the overflow pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle's growing, and it's disgusting how it's spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool, reaching into the cookie jar boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s wobbling so much— he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is sweet, but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get mad thinking about the water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes everywhere, ready to break if there's a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, making the inside seem even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup screams impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR
